name: Ride 3: BMW R 1200 GS Pack
description: Purchase the BMW R 1200 GS Pack, which includes one exclusive bike and a new Volume with 5 events.

name: DGU: Death God University - Finals Week
description: The Death Gods at the university have been avoiding these targets for a long time due to their dangerous nature. However, it is this very nature that makes it a perfect fit for a test to determine DGUs best student!

name: Erannorth Reborn: Underworld
description: Expand your Erannorth experience with over 300 new Cards, 110 new Enemies, new Challenges and fresh Events.

name: BMX Vice
description: 3D Arcade BMX game with "Retrofuturistic" and "Lowpoly" aesthetics, in which the player will make a bicycle descent through the streets of the city of Vigo.

name: Stribog
description: Survival-Action experience in a dead world destroyed by civil war. You have to complete your own story, fighting for survival with monsters and nature.

name: Quaddro 2: Blue Level Pack
description: News 40 unique levels New challenges: teleport platform and wildcard dot

name: Giraffe and Annika: Musical Mayhem Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Zombie Friday
description: Fight zombies of scalpers, miners and other vile characters on Black Friday night. Zombie top-down shooter with funny references to most recent events tormenting gamers.

name: Bram the Toymaker
description: A scary bedtime story or a horrid physical entity? The story goes that the toymaker is an undead figure who comes out at night leaving a toy on the children’s bedroom window to lure and capture them. A folktale passed through generations within the family might hold some dark secrets.

name: City: 909
description: City: 909 - is a game in which you have to go through a city of obstacles, traps and enemies who want to stop you. Nice graphics, energetic music, simple controls and emotions are waiting for you in City: 909!

name: Men of War: Assault Squad - Skirmish Pack
description: Receive a full set of 5 new skirmish missions, 1 for each faction, USA, Germany, Soviet Union, Commonwealth, Japan. Objectives of the missions are very different to the existing ones in Men of War: Assault Squad and provide a completely new challenge as your task is to defend four strategic positions against waves of enemy troops to hold out long enough to launch a counter attack and finally defeat the enemy.

name: The Food Run: Extra 64 Levels
description: 64 additional levels of The Food Run - a colourful, classic puzzle game with a few tasty twists. The aim is simple - just eat everything you can see on the screen! With 8 new themes and 2 new music tracks.

name: Shifter
description: Shifter is a rogue-lite game, where you can shift gravity and walk on walls. Shifter has 3 different areas, each of which has a unique boss fight. Use different weapons such as swords, scythes, and shotguns to escape your dream, which has been hacked and turned into a twisted game by a hacker.

name: Lawless Lands: Runemaster
description: The Runemaster DLC for Lawless Lands adds magical runestones and a fabled staff and wand to make your characters and companions even more powerful than ever before! With this comes a new title, new skill, a new magic shop in the Capital City of Pyrshen, and some extras to help on your adventures!

name: Merchant: Frozen Tome
description: Unlock the Frozen Tome and enter into the Frentir Chasm!

name: Paradise Lost
description: Shooting games. Shoot monsters and have fun.

name: Iron Sky: Invasion - Meteorblitzkrieg
description: New ships, weapons and a brand new alliance are the hallmarks of this Add-on to Iron Sky Invasion. The Reichsflughscheibe awaits, floating in the darkness of space…and you are at the helm. For the first time, Meteorblitzkrieg allows players to take control of the diabolical Moon Nazis. The mission? Protect a fleet of space Zeppelins as the combined might of earth swarms in like a plague. Only a true master of space combat can stand a chance in this all-out space brawl.

name: WWE 2K19: Rising Stars
description: The bright future of WWE is on display in the WWE 2K19 Rising Stars Pack! Play as some of WWE’s imminent Superstars, such as Ricochet, Lio Rush, Candice LeRae, Lacey Evans & more!

name: Ressifice
description: A dark 2D sidescroller hack & slash B-movie style game. Solve short puzzles, beat up anything that's getting in your way to stop the Ressifice.

name: Defensia
description: Defensia is a turn-based strategy game. Build structures, Grow carrots, Recruit bunnians, Kill enemies, Keep your castle safe!

name: Dungeon Adventure
description: You need to make a team with your characters' races, Talent, equipment, and skills to explore the dungeon. The events in the exploration will have different results depending on the weather, terrain, good and evil values, . You can also strengthen your team with all kinds of items you can get.

name: The king's Guard
description: Assemble your guard and defend the kings lands! In this turn based card game you play as a powerful commander. Set up your guard and react to dangerous situations with powerful abilities. Expand your guard and take on increasingly difficult battles.

name: Space Colonizer
description: Will you use the gravity of the planet or jump through a black hole? It’s up to you. Set an angle, speed and just watch how unsuspecting colonists fly through the space hoping, that they won’t end up flat as a pancake on some meteorite. Puzzle game with unique story will put your brain to the test.

name: LiveOnIdol
description: LiveOnIdol VR is a casual adventure game using VR controllers. We're going to show Jenny, the main character of a beautiful girl, to a VR controller camera in various places in her particular costume. It is a game that completes the photo book called LiveOnIdol by taking pictures.

name: Insexsity
description: A game of a girl who dreams of her own apartment.

name: Unseen
description: All contact with the mining ship USMSS Jerash has been lost. Search the derelict ship for answers. A Sci-Fi Horror Survival game.

name: Rules of Alchemy
description: Defy fate as you blast your way through a procedural open world, in this spell combo roguelike with thousands of items and hundreds of spells.

name: Planet Racing
description: Sin descripción

name: Air Penguin 2
description: Sin descripción

name: A.L.B.
description: Sin descripción

name: Flying Felix
description: Sin descripción

name: Fairy Tail: Friendship!
description: Sin descripción

name: Kono Subarashii Sekai ni Shukufuku wo! Kono Yokubukai Game ni Shinpan Wo!: Limited Edition
description: This edition includes the following PS4 Game: Kono Subarashii Sekai ni Shukufuku wo! Kono Yokubukai Game ni Shinpan Wo!, Original Drama CD + Game CD Soundtrack

name: Angry Bunny Race: Jungle Road
description: Sin descripción

name: Chess Kingdom
description: This is a casual game where players wear helmets and become generals, leading their soldiers to fight with the enemy.

name: Get it, Hero!
description: A game based on the traditional sport "Capture the Flag" but with one however, both are composed of heroes who will compete between who is the fastest, most stealthy, or simply who shoots the best enemy to pass. Be the Hero and take the flag, working as a team or not

name: KickOff
description: KickOff was an online soccer game.

name: Milena's manor house
description: Main character entered rumored forest inhabited by the witch. He was panicked with that it got dark sooner than he expected, so decided to look for nearby house. Then, he fined luxury manor house is not suitable for a manor house. The strange manor house is lived by witch Milena.

name: Hardpunch: Fuck 4Joy
description: An incredible organic android is created by a mysterious engineer with the mission to discover and hunt technological artifacts created before our civilization existed. However, the true motivations of the engineer hide hidden secrets. Such a mystery is marked by resentment, obsession, and lust.

name: AimGoGoGo
description: AimGoGoGo is a game for improving your aim in FPS games. It supports a lot of popular FPS games. More than 50 weapons and lots of training courses.It can help you practice recoil control of each weapon and Tracking in FPS Game and Improve your muscle memory.

name: Washed Up
description: An arcade-style top-down shooter game. See how long you can survive in a zombie-infested abandoned town.

name: City of Hope
description: In this world, you have to act as the supporter of this hopeful city. You need to recruit warriors, manage the city, and eliminate all threats outside the city. Whether you can eliminate these threats and continue to survive, these factors depend on you.

name: Metal Golem: First Contact
description: A 3rd person, Mech battle Arena, Choose between 6 soul crushing arenas and 10 stages to host your last stand against the Kaydiest. You Vs. the Swarm, To the death! And compete real time with other players scores from around the world Via the online leaderboard.

name: Heroes of Yore
description: Take histories greatest heroes and villains to settle the dispute of who is the greatest!

name: Happy Farm Simulator
description: This is a casual game that simulates planting, players can plant a variety of plants.

name: ShiroKuro's Adventure
description: "Shirokuro's Adventure" is a top-down action mini-game where you can control two characters at the same time. Control the cute twin characters "Shiro" and "Kuro" to aim for the inner part of the island!

name: The Maracot Deep
description: Turn based RPG game in fantasy setting - a set of simple elements from RPG, plus turn based movement and fights.

name: Little Cube Trip
description: Little Cube Trip is a beautiful journey through a deep and unexplored world of program code, full of terrible dangers. Complete the levels defeating unusual enemies and avoiding malicious traps.

name: VR Chess Kingdom
description: This is a casual game where players wear helmets and become generals, leading their soldiers to fight with the enemy.

name: Legend of the Ape
description: Legend Of The Ape follows the story of Ape, a mercenary whose main task is taking down Mega Co, a notorious and evil company. Follow the Ape's ups and downs as he fights his way through scores of enemies, save his friends and make some memories.

name: Pirates of the Sea
description: Lost on an island in the middle of the ocean, after a shipwreck you'll have to find a way to get off the island. It sounds easy but it's not... you'll have to survive!

name: Watermelon Country
description: See Watermelons! Get Watermelons! Tackle enemies who stand in your way. Watermelon Country is a casual adventure game where you have to use timing and skill to reach the end of each level. Love Watermelon? Love stylized gaming filters then give this a go!

name: Gemstone Defense
description: A casual single player maze-based tower defense game. Build the best maze and discover the strongest towers, if you can.

name: Rookie Bowman
description: Simple platformer game about a man searching an ancient bow in a cave. Explore the cave, collect different items, find secret rooms and fight with bosses.

name: Wolf Attack
description: Wolf Attack is a VR FPS Game that offers you different modes, solo and multiplayer. Play one of the Three Little Pigs and face the wolves that threaten the village in solo mode or destroy the other animals in multiplayer mode in epic PvP encounters!

name: Unreal Sandbox
description: Build and play with others with a physics based sandbox created in unreal engine 5

name: Escape This Big Maze!
description: It's a maze! Find your way out! Keep track of your moves and the amount of time it takes for you to make it out! Also, this helps me get through school! Hope you enjoy!

name: Princess Erch
description: Single pixel style adventure game, players will control Princess Erch to become stronger in trials. Match different skills to challenge the boss and obtain hidden rewards.

name: Casual Golf
description: An arcade game where you will send a golf ball into the hole, overcoming a unique playing field for each level.

name: Jian Zhan Xian
description: Sin descripción

name: Wing Chun: Pak Sung Bo Legends
description: "Wing Chun: Pak Sung Bo Legends" is a Fighting Beat 'em up Style with a touch of a Brawler and Survival Game where you try to defeat Dr.Chaos and Colonel Mason. The Fighting Base is build on many Mix Martial Arts Style like Wing Chun most and Pak Sung Bo mix in an MMA , where you can Attack any Enemy from any Direction.

name: Project Martians
description: The conquest of new planets has reached a new level! A well-developed system for creating a colony. Choose your own path for the development of a new society. Develop your plantations on the red planet, build your civilization!

name: Fire Sale
description: Fire Sale is rogue-lite first person shooter. As the under-payed clean-up crew you'll your way through a procedurally generated map filled with defunct security bots. Will you be able to escape, or will you clock out for good?

name: Cosmo 02
description: Cosmo 02 is a bullet hello and fixed shooter game where you, as a space soldier, will single-handedly destroy entire fleets of opponents.

name: Terebron
description: Guide Gwlader and his companions on the journey of a lifetime to save the dying god ! Solve puzzles with the mysterious Terebron, that the dying god sent you in order to reach your destination, and your destiny.

name: A Journey Through Valhalla
description: New and strange events are breaking the status quo in Valhalla which is causing unrest among the gods. Venture forth either alone or with your fellow einhärjers in this Action RPG created by three friends in their spare time.

name: Endings
description: Between Life and Death .. 2D Puzzle Platformer Game

name: Soul Elegy
description: This is a very challenging war chess + roguelike game, with random mazes, free combination of teams, and turn-based combat. In the game, players will lead all kinds of undead to counterattack the human world!

name: Blood Safari
description: Blood Safari is a fast paced 3rd person shooter in which you will gain no levels, no unlocks, no permanent account upgrades... You just drop in and start slaughtering.

name: Qualia's Sweets Craft
description: The witch "Qualia" only moves forward! Control the Qualia's familiar spirits to remove the obstacles that come her way and aim for the goal! A pop and cute 2D action puzzle game with mouse controls!

name: Prophecy of the Nun
description: The path of a group of friends falls on a mysterious mansion, and the extraordinary events that take place in the mansion are told.

name: Crash Cleaner
description: Crash Cleaner is a 2D platformer where you run and double jump around 40 levels collecting wires, spraying viruses, and avoiding horrible death from said viruses. You play as a character inside a crashed server trying to remove the viruses that crashed the server.

name: Samurai Journey
description: In this world, you have to play as a samurai, come into this world inadvertently, and the music box is taken away by the little devil. Get your music box back!

name: Decent Into Sector 32
description: Descent into Sector 32 is a 3rd persons flying mystery game. You are dispatched on a search and rescue mission to Sector 32, a giant asteroid field with many mysteries. Make the right choices or your squadron might need rescuing yourself, and the truth is, nobody is going to come for you.

name: Lost in Red Valley
description: Lost in Red Valley is a survival game set in feudal Japan. Explore. Craft. Survive! Alone or with friends!

name: Station 17
description: Venture into the echoing halls of Station 17. But Beware, not is all as it seems.

name: Alfred Hitchcock: Vertigo - Digital Deluxe Edition
description:
Preorder the Digital Deluxe Edition of Alfred Hitchcock - Vertigo to receive exclusive preorder bonuses.

The Digital Deluxe Edition includes:

- Digital Artbook & Soundtrack
- In-game filters, inspired by the original movie
- Ed, Julia & Nick Avatars
- Wallpapers

name: Windsor Road
description: A (very small) game boy project - a love letter to developer Louie Zong's college days in boston!

name: Quartet
description: A series of unlikely train robberies. A mysterious deck of cards. A fleet of deadly airships. An accidental mage. Choose from four stories, in any order, and see how they eventually intertwine in this turn-based RPG.

name: Project Wraith
description: Project Wraith will always be fast paced, bullshit-free experience that seeks to do away with frustrating gameplay design choices of modern games. No mines, no vehicles, no stun grenades, no overpowered grenades or launchers, no overpowered shotguns or snipers... a fast time to kill and a large focus on objective-oriented gameplay and anti-camping mechanics. Play the objective!

name: Heroes Strike
description: Heroes Strike - Modern Moba & Battle Royale. WolfFun. Moba tower destroy, Battle Royale, Team deathmatch and many game modes. Warriors.io - Battle Royale Action.

name: Your Boyfriend
description: Your Boyfriend is a game where you deal with a man's unhealthy desire to have you, no matter who gets hurt. And he's not afraid to leave the body laying around for you to find either.

name: Shinobi Story
description: Shinobi Story is a 3D Free Ninja MMORPG where you play as a character in the Ninja world! Choose your village and rise up the ninja ranks, even up to the Kage! It is a player driven game where the community makes decisions for the game world. Gather your allies, fight your enemies, master powerful jutsu, protect your village, or turn your back on it entirely-- this is your Shinobi Story!

name: CrowKart
description: Experience the amazing karting world of Crowsworn in glorious 3D while racing against your friends online. Choose a racer from among the characters of the Crowsworn universe (and beyond) and get ready for many fast-paced and wacky races! Use your driving prowess, never forget to drift and you will become the Crowkart Champion!

name: Metroid II: Return of Samus DX
description:
Metroid II: Return of Samus DX is a rumored Game Boy Color port which was never released.

A screenshot was featured in the German gaming magazine "Club Nintendo" that was claimed to make use of the Game Boy Color's vast color-palette. However, the game never released and its existence has been contested by a testimony from Nintendo of America translator Dan Owsen who was unaware of plans for the port, suggesting that the screenshot featured in the magazine may be a mock-up.

name: Bokura no Daiundoukai
description: Sin descripción

name: CrossPlanet
description: Arena Shooter goes Third Person! CrossPlanet is a Sci-Fi shooter where players can go head-to-head in the online Multiplayer, or squad up with friends and take on thrilling boss battles against huge unearthly creatures.

name: Spine
description: Experience Gun Fu like never before with SPINE, an immersive and highly cinematic action game set in a cyberpunk world. Explore the realistic vision of a near-future with a rebellious street artist Redline and her sentient combat implant, Spine, as they challenge a totalitarian AI regime in search of Redline’s captured brother. Participate in epic gunfights against charismatic opponents, while performing spectacular choreography with firearms!

name: Dekaron M
description: Dekaron M is a mobile MMORPG adaptation of Ubifun Studio’s classic title Dekaron Online. Originally for the PC, the Dekaron IP (Intellectual Property Rights) is known for its brutal action gameplay and dark fantasy worldview.

name: Absylon 7
description:
Absylon 7 is a first-person psychological horror game with shooter elements. The game features 13 different locations with multiple playthrough options.

The player investigates several incidents near the Absylon research complex in Eastern Europe. The player has several types of weapons at his disposal, but it's necessary to use them wisely, as there is a limited amount of firepower at all levels. For this purpose we made several variants of passing each level, traps and unique AI for each type of enemies.

name: Abyssus
description: Gather your friends and dive into Abyssus' fast-paced multiplayer shooting action. Fight through gorgeous hand-crafted levels in a roguelite adventure that will put your tactical skills to the ultimate test. Wield powerful brine-powered weapons and refit them with ancient technologies to gain an edge over your foes. Obtain divine blessings to enhance your firepower with elemental and mystic effects.

name: Outbreak Island
description: Survive on a remote Island, where a mysterious Outbreak awakens bloodthirsty monsters at night. Craft, build and defend your base in the brutal world of Outbreak Island, an open-world sandbox survival horror game.

name: Alcúdia
description: Sin descripción

name: Dystopia: Contest of Heroes
description:
A post-apocalyptic world where society is being controlled by big corporations. Do you have what it takes to build an empire by taking over districts of New York while collecting sci-fi themed gear, raid other players, and upgrade your base? Develop alliances and lead them into economic growth, support them in raids, or wage wars against other alliances.

Join Conor McGregor in the world's biggest multiplayer tournament platform and win epic in-game and real-life prizes!

name: Svaland
description:
Svaland is a funny action RPG game inspired by classics of the genre.
It can be played single (game can be played without connection) and also can be multiplayer (LAN: sharing connection for now).
It's easy to control and there's no pay-to-win as you can obtain every object in the game different ways. Even best items can be obtained totally free.

You can choose up to 12 spells from 104 divided by fire, water, air, earth, frost, lightning, nature, poison, blood, light, darkness and necromancy. There's also basic skills. Some of them are passive, other are survival or damaging.
Play one of the next classes: Fighter, Tracker, Worker or Mystic.
Choose your weapons as they determine your basic attacks: swords, axes, hammers, daggers, staves, spears, shields, two-handed weapons, and dual weild, bows, crossbows, guns...

Fight orcs, dwarves, elves, kobolds, bandtis, goblins, gnolls, dragons, skeletons, zombies, and many more... Or ally with them. There are many possibilities.
You decide your adventure with your travels across forests, swamps and deserts. To the Capital, or the other side to Nokmar. Maybe to the east desert where air magic is used, or down to the south of dwarves and their metalwork. Reveal the secrets of the elves! There are lot of treasures full of gold, equipment and spells.

Use a complete SET to get bonus stats. Combine your skills, weapons and talents to success in your battles and combats.
You don't need to level up, but a good equipment, talents and spell selection (even not being mystic, there are passive skills, and blood spells don't requitre mana but health).

Enjoy the experience in an extense world populated by creatures with their own point of view and conflicts. Help them to solve or provoke clash. Thanks to KARMA system you can align your character to unlock LIGHT and NECROMANCY skills.

name: Cuboy Back to the Cubeture: Era 1
description: Sin descripción

name: Halo: Out With a Whimper
description: Halo: Out With a Whimper was a side-scrolling shooter take on Halo's Firefight PvE mode and served as a gameplay demo of sorts for their previously upcoming game Halo: Olympus, cancelled as of 2013.

name: Blox
description: Blox is a online block stacking game. Play against friends and compete for the top spots on the leaderboard.

name: Star Academy
description: Sin descripción

name: Le Manège Enchanté
description: Sin descripción

name: Space Station Tycoon
description: A space-themed sim featuring party mode and co-op with a heavy dose of humor.

name: Nura's Wish
description: Nura's Wish is an atmospheric puzzle adventure in which you carry the last light on the earth. Solve brilliant puzzles by illuminating ancient altars. Explore a mysterious world filled with riddles and secrets. Run and jump freely through diverse and open environments.

name: The Orphan: A Pop-Up Book Adventure
description:
The Orphan: A Pop-Up Book Adventure is a 3D side scroller, single player, puzzle adventure game with a scary atmosphere.

Immerse yourself in the fantastic, dark and magical world of the pop-up book The Orphan. Caught between the pages you need to breathe new life into the book and experience the story in order to escape in the end

name: Margonem 2
description:
Explore Dungeons, get the Loot, craft your Deck!

Are you looking for adventure, treasure or both? Explore Dungeons, defeat Monsters, and find Treasure!

Craft powerful cards and gear to overcome the dangers of the Dungeons.

Margonem 2 is a free-to-play indie action card game. Mix of rogue-like dungeon crawler with a deckbuilder for mobile devices.

name: Super Stacker 3
description: Super Stacker returns once again with more challenges! The goal in Super Stacker 3 is to successfully stack objects and keep the tower in balance for a certain time. You must pay attention to sizes (and thus the weights) of the objects. Can you beat all levels? Have fun!

name: Pokémon Resolute
description: A Pokemon fan game set in the Sylon region, a year after the events of Pokemon Victory Fire. You find out that Team Mirage, an evil organization from Tyron is going to "reform". It is now up to you to stop them and start your journey

name: Operation Outsmart
description: Physics-based sandbox game where you build wacky machines to solve environmental puzzles. Create alloys from a mix of metals to reinforce your builds, recruit koalas to operate your weapons, solve puzzles to get rewarded with parts and weapons, and save the island from the erupting volcano!

name: Interlakes
description: Interlakes, a game being developed by indie studio Team Revived, is an open world sci-fi third-person survival shooter game inspired by War of the Worlds and games such as Half-Life 2 and The Last of Us. In Interlakes, you explore a vast and beautiful world invaded and in the verge of being conquered by alien forces. We aim to improve aspects of survival genre.

name: Vroom!
description: Vroom! is going to be a battle royale style obstacle racing game where you can drive and customise toy cars and trucks and race online with 60+ players, alone or in a squad in realistic environments.

name: Five Nights in Anime 2
description: This FNaF fangame is a parody of the 2nd Five Nights at Freddy's (go figure). The mechanics are pretty much the same, but like the 1st FNIA game, as the nights progress you'll find animatronic additions that wasn't in the original, and different mechanics being used. And of course, all the animatronics are Anime styled Girls... of course.

name: Killer Bean
description: You are Killer Bean, a rogue assassin who takes out the trash in this world, one bullet at a time. The procedurally generated story changes every time you start a new campaign in this third person, roguelike shooter.

name: Reverse Module
description: An Action RPG about Utopia/Dystopia balance that aims to present some interesting concepts. The aim of the game is to make the player think and pose some ethical dillemas about how an actual Utopia could be achieved. It's dedicated to my lost niece and my family who have supported me so much.

name: Geogames
description:
Website that offers some games based on the Google Street View API.
The main game mode is the City Meetup where two people lost in a city need to meet each other only using voice communication.
Other game modes are under development.

name: Time Patrol
description: Travel back in time with the Time Patrols, and prove your aptitude by completing demanding missions at various moments in the past and the present. The time machine will take you and your trusty handgun to places where only the ones with a sharp eye and swift hands can succeed.

name: VB Mario Kart
description: VB Mario Kart is an unreleased Mario Kart game for the Virtual Boy. The game was cancelled during development due to the failure of the Virtual Boy. Nothing is known about the game, with the only evidence to prove it's existence being a magazine from Germany called "The Big N", which focuses on Nintendo products.

name: Abandoned
description: Abandoned is a cinematic, first-person horror survival shooter set in a highly detailed open world environment and favours a realistic approach to survival

name: CryptoCannoneer
description: Join the livestream and fire tennis balls at targets using a turret that can be controlled from anywhere in the world! Collect NFTs, earn achievements, and use Turret Token to fire off flamethrowers!

name: Cope: Shodown
description: Featuring as one of the exclusive products of COPE, it aims to be the first crypto-tokenized 2D retro pixel art game in the Solana ecosystem.

name: Dungeon Rummage: Another Isekai?!
description:
The player gets reincarnated in a fantasy world after dying a horrible death. The game's genres include RPG, City building, Dating sim, Dungeon crawler, Rogue lite and choices matter.

The game contains a lot of meta- humour, funny characters and a completely custom "Rummage system"

name: Stream Pirates
description: Stream Pirates is a streamer-led ocean exploration game played with your community—live during stream! The Streamer is the “Captain” and the viewers make up the crew. Plunder uncharted islands together and hunt for buried treasure to level up your units and pirate ship!

name: World of Pets
description: Build your pet collection using potions, eggs and by completing quests! Made by the Norris Nuts.

name: The Age of Hell
description: You are The Crusader, standing against all that hell can throw against you. Take up thy hammer and lay waste to the horde. Battle through immense gothic cathedrals, abstract brutalism and infernal palaces as you take the fight to the very depths of the Abyss.

name: Fracture Hell
description: A simplistic 2D top-down shooter mixed with wave-based survival and upgrades. Survive a wave, earn power cores, spend power cores to improve your guns and character stats, and repeat. Can you reach the end...?

name: Spider Crisis
description: The world is infested with giant mutated spiders. In Spider Crisis you operate a small remote control tank equipped with deadly weapons. Use your weapons to shoot, bomb, and burn these creatures back to where they came from.

name: The Revenge of Sophia Red
description: The Revenge Of Sophia Red is a first-person psychedelic horror adventure with puzzle elements. It's about the life of the book author Sophia Red. Love can turn into hate and make people blind. Revenge has become the only meaning in Sophia's life. This is her story.

name: Jetpack City Action VR
description: Fly freely with a jetpack and enjoy the view of realistic modeled city. 3 different stuff you can do in game, fly freely, or collect cargo or fight against the drones. This game was planned as a commercial promotional game and was played and enjoyed by the participants in many fairs and meetings.

name: Detective Tycoon
description: Travel 70 years back in time to the days of noir detectives and lead your own 1-bit detective agency! Solve the most difficult cases. Hire new detectives. Expand your office.

name: MaguMagu Pro
description: A baseball game that allows you to easily enjoy the hitting feeling! With super-exquisite 3D graphics and an absolutely smooth feel, meet friends anytime and anywhere to play real-time battles!

name: Stellar Valkyrie
description: Space bounty hunter Falco must explore the solar system in search of his ex-girlfriend and destroy the Black Star cult. Collect bounties, upgrade your equipment, explore planets, crack wise, & fight aliens in this GZDoom-powered Retro-FPS adventure.

name: Komako
description: A hand-drawn adventure game about an orphan girl exploring an old, abandoned theme park, and meeting its inhabitants.

name: Rogun Arena
description: Classic shooter with three game modes: Arena-battles with waves of monsters and people. Defrag-skill and time levels. Single player - a story game in the classic style.

name: Flixy Cats
description: Flixy Cats is a 3D platform where you can control Max and his entire cat crew as they defend themselves by hitting the rats with marshmallow mallets. You can explore different worlds, discover new power ups to help in the journey, team up with another cat to assist you and much more.

name: Freyr's Love
description: An adventure beyond myths. Control the gods and witness the story through Skirnir. Kill them all.

name: Snowball Fight At Christmas
description: 選完哲學家皇帝沒多久的矮額，一覺醒來就發現自己被綁到了一望無際的雪地上，在打倒...不重要的8+9雪人後，被雪仗神告知了「因為我想打雪仗，所以你們來陪我打雪仗」這件也太隨便了吧的事？只有打倒雪仗神才能從這裡出去。

name: Boxing Babes: Sexy Fight Hentai Anime Girls
description: BOXING BABES: Sexy Fight Hentai Anime GirlsThe Action Echii Hentai Boxing Game its released on PC! Box, Customize, Flirt and Fight.

name: The Song of Survivors
description: The Song of Survivors is a free-to-play massively-cooperative bullet-hell style MMORPG. If you die, a new hero reborn who carries your legacy onto your next adventure!!

name: Euro Truck Simulator 2: Heart of Russia
description:
Explore the heart of Russia, Moscow, and beyond. Feel the spirit of Russian history driving through centuries-old cities. Get lost in the sea of trees and open plains.

As a direct result to Russia's invasion of Ukraine, SCS Software announced its decision to not go through with the release of Heart of Russia DLC.

name: Start! Heart Thief
description: Our heroine ruby is an orphan, Every morning, she goes out to explore the secret island of God Every night, she put on her nightdress

name: Pandemic Heart
description: Pandemic Heart is a relaxing visual novel game with multiple endings that set about a wild story of love in the Pandemic or the Outbreak.

name: RavenHeart Hospital: A Medical Visual Novel
description: RavenHeart Hospital: A Medical Visual Novel is a surgery simulation visual novel. Take on the role of an ace surgeon in training at the world's greatest hospital. Operate on patients with a variety of conditions. Befriend and romance a colorful cast of doctors. Save lives and melt hearts.

name: Aske
description: A first person shooter that sets you far away, near death.

name: Corona Simulator: Savior Edition
description: The Savior Edition, includes cool new features, like premium UI themes, more game events, and a new virus strain. Additionally, 20% of the revenue made with this Edition will get donated to the WHO COVID-19 Solidarity Response Fund.

name: Karma Flow 2: Tears of a Ghost
description: Karma Flow 2: Tears of a Ghost is a Noir Action Stealth game which focuses on narrative and freedom of action. Play as Florien Kealborn and uncover the truth in a game that lets you carry out missions in a way that most suits your own playstyle, making you plan things out and act as you wish.

name: Spunky: Gangster Simulator
description: Enter the world of crime with Spunky Gangster Simulator. Assume the role of a mafia leader in this role-playing themed game. The mafia bosses, monopolize their presence in the crime world will develop their gangs and struggle with each other. Who will establish domination in the city?

name: Pig Skater Simulator
description: You are a pig, and not a meat! Jump on a skateboard and do the trick! Create some chaos and gather pearls, this game will let you immerse with no rest.

name: The Hauntings
description: The Hauntings is a 1-4 player online co-op investigation and exorcism game. Using a wide range of paranormal investigation equipment your group must try and successfully discover the source of the haunting and proceed to remove the threat from the area!

name: Revenger
description: A fast-paced, tough as nails first-person shooter evocative of the direct-to-video action flicks of the 1980's, Revenger is a short, but memorable experience about one man's hunt to rescue his daughter, and kill everyone responsible for her kidnapping.

name: Zombie In Town
description: Zombie In Town is an action packed tower defense game in which you play as a boy who tries to defend his town from zombies invasion.

name: Cyberpunk Detective
description: This is a cyberpunk crime fiction game, that will allow you to visit the City and unfold its secrets. You will play as a private detective, one of the dying species, that still seeks for the truth, justice and money. Mostly money.

name: Pearls of the Oceans
description: Together for the Planet! Evade and outsmart the many dangers of the oceans, collect the Pearls to save the World. Stay on your toes through 100 handcrafted levels and challenge yourself to climb the leaderboard and prevent the war to begin.

name: The Skinwalker Investigations
description: Amidst dozens of reports of missing people, mutilated animals, unidentified lights in the sky, strange creatures and odd poltergeist-like activity, 2 FBI agents are sent to investigate a mysterious ranch in order to ascertain the truth. What they uncover becomes a hellish nightmare beyond imagining!

name: Flowcubes
description: Have you ever been led to a dead end by your phone and thought you can do it better? With FLOWCUBES you are in control of the path. Lead the people to their destination and make sure they make it there. Place and combine flow fields to generate a world with a perfect path from A to B.

name: Endro
description: The endros need your help to survive in this world of endless monsters that keeps appearing. Make the endro species last for eternity and help them defeat the evil.

name: Space Box Battle Arena
description: Design and build your unique free-form spaceship and fight your enemies for victory in the Space Box! Machine guns, lasers, flamethrowers, harpoons, energy shields, black hole generators, and much more equipment to choose your game style! The exciting PvP sandbox battle arena awaits!

name: Jiguland
description: Jiguland is an open world roguelike rpg taking place in a twisted setting of medieval modern life. Use clever tactics and creative strategy to survive this unforgiving place.

name: Noyah: Corrupted Memories
description: Noyah: Corrupted Memories is a roguelike deckbuilder, in pixel art, with random battle generation, day and night cycle, climate events, advanced rune system, that allows you to create endless possibilities with a single card.

name: Cracked Up
description: Cracked Up is a fun puzzle platformer with eggs that can change the way you play!

name: Deadly Fight
description: Deadly Fight is unique fighting game that take you back to arcade style 90's game but with modern graphics.

name: Potato's Dream
description: A clicker game where you make a potato's dream come true. Will you help it obtain its dream or will it slowly rot away in a bag in a dark kitchen?

name: Ball Challenge
description: With a retro pixel art graphics, Ball Challenge is a hard game that requires a lot of skill and agility from the player to go through all it's challenges. Dodge monsters, spikes and traps, collect the necessary diamonds and try to reach the end of each level.

name: Who Killed Mr. White?
description: A turn-based murder mystery.

name: 逆剑2
description: Sin descripción

name: Doomer Simulator
description: Sin descripción

name: Terragon: Symbol Of Magic
description: In an epic fantasy world, run and managed by guilds of magicians, you play as a young magician who is eager to join the guild that supports and protects his village. After being accepted to the guild, a great adventure begins, with plenty of quests and great battles.

name: Farmer Time: A Magical Farming Adventure
description: This is my dream project known as Farmer Time: A Magical Farming Adventure that follows a wizard in its adventure with inheriting a farm which the wizard will need to keep from going bankrupt.

name: Political Fight Club
description: Cast your vote and step in the ring! The highly anticipated game from EJR Gaming! Choose a fighter from the likeness of current politicians to historical and fight it out in a 2D old school fighting game format! Bring your sense of humor as well, this game will be fun for everyone!
